output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# Define the URL for the raw TSV file
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cca-cce/osm-edu/refs/heads/main/gen_z_workplace_study.tsv"

# Read the data from the URL as a tibble
df <- read_delim(url, delim = "\t", show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  as_tibble()

# Process data and generate the bar plot
df %>%
  group_by(Generation) %>%
  summarize(mean_priority = mean(Mental_Health_Priority, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Generation, y = mean_priority, fill = Generation)) +
  geom_col(width = 0.7) +
  geom_text(aes(label = round(mean_priority, 2)), vjust = -0.5, fontface = "bold") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 5)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Mean Mental Health Priority by Generation",
    subtitle = "Data source: GitHub Repository (osm-edu)",
    x = "Generation",
    y = "Mean Priority Score (1-5)",
    fill = "Generation"
  ) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
